title: Settings

linked-accounts.title: Linked Accounts
linked-accounts.description: Manage the accounts connected to PlaylistWizard.
linked-accounts.note: NOTE: Linking additional accounts does not yet enable any extra functionality. In a future update, you will be able to transfer playlists between accounts and manage playlists across multiple accounts.
linked-accounts.last-provider-tooltip: You must keep at least one linked account.

disconnect-confirm.title: Disconnect {{provider}}
disconnect-confirm.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect {{provider}}? You can reconnect it later.

generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

danger-zone.title: Danger Zone
danger-zone.description: Permanently delete your PlaylistWizard account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

delete-confirm.title: Delete Account
delete-confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete your PlaylistWizard account? This action cannot be undone.
